main event: An unidentified aerial phenomenon was observed in Alaska on February 9, 1953, described as an elliptical object with red and white colors.
interesting points: The object was reported to be traveling at an estimated speed of over 2000 MPH, The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes, The object was observed at an altitude estimated between 11,000-12,000 feet, The sighting was made by a USAF pilot, The object was part of a larger investigation into unidentified flying objects by the USAF.
